name: Pull-ups
description: Hang from a bar and pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.

name: Push-ups
description: Lower and raise your body with your hands on the ground, keeping your body straight.

name: Dips
description: Lower and raise your body using parallel bars or a bench, focusing on triceps and chest.

name: Squats
description: Bend your knees and lower your hips, then stand back up, engaging your legs and glutes.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward with one leg, lower your body, then push back to starting position.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body exercise involving a squat, push-up, and jump.

name: Step-ups
description: Step onto a raised platform and back down, engaging legs and glutes.

name: Jump Rope
description: Jump continuously over a rope, great for cardio and coordination.
